description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Monster Escape is an action-puzzle hybrid where players navigate their monsters safely through levels.  Along the way they must make a pathway with puzzle pieces to connect the landscape and avoid a variety of enemies.  Each level requires a new approach while still allowing multiple solutions.
